prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a sleek body and powerful wings.
Imagine a legendary creature that embodies the power of ice and frost.
Design a mythical Pokemon that can manipulate the weather with its icy breath.
Generate an elegant dragon-type that thrives in snowy mountains.
Show me a fierce Pokemon with shimmering blue and white scales.
Make a majestic creature that can freeze its opponents in battle.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that roams the tundras and glacial caves.
